attributes.additional_details: It has been made clear over recent events, Cressida Dick's actions are not for the safety of the people or police but instead to assist the promotion of far left activists like BLM AntiFA etc.
attributes.background: Remove Dame Cressida Dick from office for political alliance with the extremist group BLM.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, including calls to remove someone from their job.
